TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit OutputCache extends System.Object
public ref class OutputCache abstract sealed

summary.span: 可通过编程方式访问网站的配置文件中指定的输出缓存提供程序。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the output-cache providers that are specified in the configuration file for a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输出缓存在内存中存储生成的页面、 控件和 HTTP 响应输出。Output caching stores the generated output of pages, controls, and HTTP responses in memory. 输出缓存可以缓存内容，具体取决于查询字符串和窗体发布参数到页面上、 在浏览器类型，或者在用户的语言的不同版本。Output caching enables you to cache different versions of content depending on the query string and on form-post parameters to a page, on browser type, or on the language of the user. 你可以配置 ASP.NET 缓存特定段的输出缓存项。You can configure ASP.NET to cache an output-cache entry for a specific period. 此外可以配置 ASP.NET 逐出某个缓存项自动基于外部事件，如缓存依赖于数据库中的更改。You can also configure ASP.NET to evict a cache entry automatically based on an external event such as changes in the database that the cache depends on. 类使你能够扩展输出缓存。The class enables you to extend output caching. 例如，可以配置一个或多个自定义输出缓存提供程序针对本地或远程磁盘、 数据库、 云存储和分布式的缓存引擎等其他存储设备。For example, you can configure one or more custom output-cache providers that target other storage devices such as local or remote disks, databases, cloud storage, and distributed cache engines.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultProviderName As String
public: static property System::String ^ DefaultProviderName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取为输出缓存配置的默认提供程序的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the default provider that is configured for the output cache.
The name of the default provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，所有 HTTP 响应，呈现的页面和控件使用`AspNetInternalProvider`，内存中输出缓存提供程序。By default, all HTTP responses, rendered pages, and controls use `AspNetInternalProvider`, the in-memory output cache provider. 若要使用不同的提供程序，设置`defaultProvider`属性为可选的提供程序的名称。To use a different provider, set the `defaultProvider` attribute to the name of the alternative provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig object Deserialize(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

summary.span: 将二进制对象反序列化为输出缓存数据。

span.span: Deserializes a binary object into output-cache data.

returns.span: 包含经过反序列化的数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the deserialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-method-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-method-note.md)] 由输出缓存提供程序正在部分信任环境下使用此方法。This method is used by output-cache providers that are operating under partial trust.

exception.span: 方法所返回的反序列化对象不是有效的输出缓存类型。

span.span: The deserialized object that is returned by the method is not a valid output-cache type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Providers As OutputCacheProviderCollection

summary.span: 获取网站的配置文件中指定的输出缓存提供程序的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the output-cache providers that are specified in the configuration file for a Web site.

value.span: 所配置的提供程序的集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置一个或多个自定义输出缓存提供程序针对其他存储设备，例如本地或远程磁盘、 数据库、 云存储和分布式的缓存引擎。You configure one or more custom output-cache providers that target other storage devices, such as local or remote disks, databases, cloud storage, and distributed cache engines. 若要配置自定义输出缓存提供程序，您将提供程序添加到集合，由表示属性。To configure custom output-cache providers, you add a provider to the collection that is represented by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Serialize (System.IO.Stream stream, object data);
.method public static hidebysig void Serialize(class System.IO.Stream stream, object data) cil managed
public: static void Serialize(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::Object ^ data);

param.name: stream
param.span: 包含经过序列化的二进制数据的对象。

span.span: The object to contain the serialized binary data.

param.name: data
param.span: 要序列化的输出缓存数据。

summary.span: 将输出缓存数据序列化为二进制数据。

span.span: Serializes output-cache data into binary data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由输出缓存提供程序正在部分信任环境下使用此方法。This method is used by output-cache providers that are operating under partial trust.

exception.span: 不是指定的输出缓存类型之一。

span.span: is not one of the specified output-cache types.
